item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: Pride First Gen I will be graduating this may with a BSA in biology as a first generation student! Below I will be using the reticulate package to code in both R and python. You can embed an R code chunk like this: library(reticulate) This_year_was_awful <- "I am a" Senior_year_was <- "I am so very greatful to" I_cannot_believe_I_surived = "proud first generation student!" absolutely_insane = "all my friends and family who helped me along the way!
